Data.EventName: Tech Talk - Things Every React Native Developer Should Know
Data.EventShortDescription: Let's do a React Native Tech Talk! We'll do it at the Skookum office in Uptown Charlotte.
Data.EventLongDescription:
Let's do a React Native Tech Talk! We'll do it at the Skookum office in Uptown Charlotte.

      Agenda:
      
      6:30 PM Checkin and Snacks (Pizza and Beer provided)
      
      7:00 PM Tech Talk - Things Every React Native Developer Should Know
      
      7:40 PM Q&A
      
      Thanks to Skookum and BeerCharlotte.com for Sponsoring!
      
      Parking:
      BB&T building is the best option. You can also park at Courtyard Mariott - both are within the same block as the Skookum building.
